metadata.name: Voice to CRM Integration Stack
metadata.author: Microsoft AI Accelerate Team
metadata.description: A comprehensive voice-enabled CRM data entry solution that converts speech to text and automatically creates CRM records in Dynamics 365, ServiceNow, and other platforms.
metadata.longDescription: The Voice to CRM Integration Stack revolutionizes data entry by enabling natural language processing for CRM systems. Users can speak naturally to create accounts, contacts, opportunities, and support cases without manual typing. The stack includes intelligent entity extraction, relationship mapping, and multi-platform CRM support.
features: Real-time speech-to-text conversion with high accuracy
Natural language understanding for CRM entity extraction
Batch record processing from audio files
benefits: Hands-free CRM updates for field workers

useCases.title: Field Sales Updates
useCases.description: Sales representatives can update CRM records immediately after client meetings using voice notes while driving.

useCases.title: Customer Service Call Logging
useCases.description: Support agents can create and update tickets using voice commands during or after customer calls.

useCases.title: Executive Meeting Notes
useCases.description: Executives can dictate meeting outcomes and action items that automatically create tasks and opportunities.

useCases.title: Healthcare Patient Records
useCases.description: Medical professionals can update patient records and create follow-up tasks through voice commands.

dependencies: Modern web browser with microphone access

components.description: Handles all CRUD operations with Dynamics 365 Web API

components.description: Manages ServiceNow ticket creation and workflow automation

components.description: Generates professional emails from voice commands

components.name: extract_sharepoint_document_url_agent.py
components.description: Extracts and links SharePoint documents to CRM records

architecture.dataFlow: Voice Input → Speech-to-Text → NLP Processing → Entity Extraction → CRM API → Confirmation
architecture.scalability: Horizontal scaling supported with load balancing

security.encryption: TLS 1.3 for data in transit, AES-256 for data at rest
